text: The allocation sequence was generated using a computergenerated table of random numbers and block randomisation with blocks of various sizes by an investigator who had no role in recruitment, treatment or assessment of the babies. The concealment of allocation was ensured using sequentially numbered, opaque, sealed envelopes.
sentences: The allocation sequence was generated using a computergenerated table of random numbers and block randomisation with blocks of various sizes by an investigator who had no role in recruitment, treatment or assessment of the babies.
The concealment of allocation was ensured using sequentially numbered, opaque, sealed envelopes.
